author: Tobias Grey
title: In a New ‘Macbeth,’ Crime Novelist Jo Nesbo Sets the Tragedy in 1970s U.K.
text:
When the Norwegian crime writer Jo Nesbø first encountered “Macbeth,” he was in his teens. Rereading it over the years, the 58-year-old feels that the older he gets, the more he understands its characters and their motivations. 
“Henrik Ibsen is our national playwright,” says Mr. Nesbø, who lives in Oslo, “but ‘Macbeth’ sort of became my play.” 

Now...
